question: Who among the following was the author of "Tughlaq Nama"?
explanation: The famous Sufi poet, Amir Khusrau wrote a historic masnavi (or poem) \"Tughlaq Nama (Book of the Tughlaqs)\" about the reign of Ghiyasuddin Tughlaq and other Tughlaq rulers. Excerpts of the works done by him are Wast-ul-Hayat, Nuh Sipihr, Khamsa, Baqia-Naqia, etc.
